name: Nature World (ALPHA)
description:
If you like nature then this game is for you! NatureWorld is a game about planting seeds that turn into trees! they will produce oxygen so the player can survive! You also have to survive in 20 Minutes and make sure you don't die from lack of oxygen! You can also cut down dead trees to gather Seeds!

Controls:

Left Click (Mine. Hold for 3 seconds on dirt and 10 seconds on stone. Hold it on a dead tree to gather seeds from the tree)

Right Click (Plant)

Space or W (Jump)

A and D (Left Right)

Esc (Menu)

Features:

Randomly Generated World

Trees

Mining

Pause

Options

Cutting Down Dead Trees

And more!!

Devs:

Artist: https://shiptoaster.itch.io

Music Artist: https://itch.io/profile/steviebaggins

Programmers: https://itch.io/profile/bloodleo And https://redimator.itch.io/
